pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Getdeck Beiboot_Getdeck Beiboot_ (or just Beiboot for brevity) is a Kubernetes-in-Kubernetes solution. It was born from the idea to provide Getdeck users a simple yet flexible solution to spin up **hybrid cloud development** infrastructure. This is useful for Kubernetes development workloads which grew too large to run on a development machine (or with pony workloads on MacOS and Windows machines). # Beiboot ClientThe Beiboot client is a Python API to manage Beiboot clusters. It can set up and tear down Kubernetes instancesas well as establish connections.
